mapper.select: select t.login_id as loginId, t.mobile, t.phone mobilephone, t.email, t.company, t.user_state as userState, t.user_id as userId, t.user_name as userName, t.org_id as orgId from basis.basis_vw_user_psw t where t.user_id = #{id}

select t.plan_id planId, t.id, t.plan_title planTitle, t.plan_address planAddress, t.plan_start_date planStartDate, t.plan_end_date planEndDate, t.plan_states planStates, t.plan_code planCode, t.plan_photo_url planPhotoUrl, t.plan_explain planExplain, t.plan_get_explain planGetExplain, t.plan_qrcode_url planQrcodeUrl from market.market_tb_plan_activity t where t.id = #{id}

select case (t.status) when 'N' then '未参加' when 'Y' then '已参加' end status, t.avatar_url avatarUrl, p.plan_title planTitle, p.plan_address planAddress from market.market_wx_user_info t left join market.market_tb_plan_activity p on p.id = t.activity_id where t.open_id = #{openId}
select t.id from market.market_tb_plan_activity t where t.plan_code = #{code}

select case (t.status) when 'N' then '未领取' when 'Y' then '已领取' end status, t.avatar_url avatarUrl, t.nick_name nickName from market.market_wx_user_info t left join market.market_tb_plan_activity p on p.id = t.activity_id where t.activity_id = #{planId}
select t.status from market.market_wx_user_info t left join market.market_tb_plan_activity p on p.id = t.activity_id where t.open_id = #{openId} and t.activity_id = #{activityId}
